resources.string: What would you like to do?
May I ask for your first name?
Nice to meet you! How about your last name?
Are you a male or a female?
"Hi, I'm Cate! I'm your personal virtual companion. Let's get started!"
What\'s your name? Find your name in the list. If it\'s not there, press new user so I can get to know you better.
What do you want to do? If you want to have a check up, press monitoring. If you feel sick, press consultation, and let\'s talk about it.
Do you have a vaccination record? If not, just press skip.
Is the picture okay? If yes, press continue.
Is your picture okay? If yes, press continue.
Now, uncover your left eye. Then, cover your right eye.
Now let\'s check how well you can see colors. Tell me the shape you see by pressing the buttons below.
Let\'s find out how well you can hear. Please wear the earphones. Press the Yes button every time you hear a sound.
Now, let\'s do this fun activity.
Help the butterfly go to the flowers. Use a finger from your non-dominant hand to trace the path.
Help the butterfly go to the flowers. Use the pen with your dominant hand to trace the path.
Assistant, has the user used the pen without difficulties?
Help the lion go to his friends. Use a finger of your non dominant hand to trace the path.
Help the lion go to his friends. Use the pen with your dominant hand to trace the path.
Thanks for telling me about your problem! I\'ll send this to a doctor so they can help you soon.
Assistant, press ready button when the child is ready.
Assistant, do you want to add remarks regarding the child\'s monitoring tests?
Assistant, do you want to add remarks to the child\'s profile?
You seem to have some problems seeing. Try to visit an eye doctor when you can!
It looks like you\'re having problems seeing colors. Try to visit an eye doctor about it when you can!
You seem to have hearing problems. Try to visit an ear doctor when you can!
Work on your gross motor skills! Try to exercise more and play outside.
Your gross motor skills are great!
That\'s okay! Let\'s move on to the next test.
You may need to work on your fine motor skills!
Your fine motor skills are great!
I don\'t know, I just feel happy today
I met a new friend today!
I will talk to them today
They are coming over soon to visit me
I walked around the neighbourhood and talked to a few of my neighbours
Can I do Anything for you?
That is good two hear... Do you want me to do anything for you?
Awwe... that\'s sweeet. Do you want to set a reminder to call them again later?
There! I have set a reminder. It will notify you when it is near
Nice... Make sure to keep talking to them to become closer to them.
Calling one of your family members...
Okay... just talk to me if you need anything!
Okay... just don\'t forget to talk to them later on!
Good Job... Be sure to talk to hem every time you go outside!
Okay... just don\'t forget that your family will visit you soon
Ohhhh that\'s interesting... What made you happy when you went outside?
This is Great News! Do you want to set a reminder when they are coming here so you can prepare?
I think my family is too busy for me
I had a fight with someone.
I see my family a lot but we do not interact that much.
I heard something bad from the news.
I want to go see someone
Hey I am here, I think I can suggest something to help you feel better.
But I think I can suggest something to make you feel better.
I will try not to go into it anymore as it may make you feel uncomfortable.
It is hard to lose someone you love and care for, I am so sad to hear about your loss. If you feel like talking, please do not hesitate to talk to me.
Okay... just do not forget to talk to them later on! They might be missing you already!!
Okay... just do not forget to talk to them later on! They might ask you out to see you soon!
Okay... Just remember your family loves you and if ever you feel down just open my app.
Awwwwe what made you feel lonely?
Do you feel like not talking about this?
Do you want me to set a reminder for you to contact someone to go see them?
Awwwe what about your family makes you sad?
Could doing something else help you feel better?
Did that help you feel any better?
I think I can suggest something to help you.
Awww, that is pretty tough to hear, I guess you could maybe tell them about this problem and maybe they would do something to fix it.
What about your family makes you sad?
I will try not to go into it anymore.
Set a reminder to call them later?
Set a reminder when they are going to visit?
Do you want me to call them right now?
What made you happy when you went outside?
What about your family made you happy?
I am glad I could help Thank you for talking to me!! See you soon!
I had a fight with my family
I am angry at myself because I miss my family and I am scared to contact them.
I don\'t know why. I just feel angry.
They don\'t have time for me.
Do you want to talk about it?
Okay. Talk to me when you feel like sharing.
What about your family made you angry??
Fights are normal within family members. You should tell them that you\'re sorry to resolve this.
You should contact them and see if you can meet up later on. Even if you are scared and angry right now, the feeling of joy that you get when you see your family will be worth it.
Please don\'t be angry with them. Maybe it is because they are just very busy right now. Do you want to talk to them and see how they are doing?
Okay. Just make sure to talk to them later on.
Okay. Please talk to me if you still feel angry.
Do you want me to do anything to distract you from your anger?
Do you want to talk to them and see how they are doing?
